job.title: Machine Learning and Data Junior Engineer
job.description: <strong><strong>Working at MIT offers opportunities, an environment, a culture – and benefits – that just aren’t found together anywhere else. If you’re curious, motivated, want to be part of a unique community, and help shape the future – then take a look at this opportunity. <br><br></strong><strong> Information on MIT’s COVID-19 vaccination requirement can be found at the bottom of this posting.</strong></strong>
